item.title: Cipher: Getting Rich in Every Direction! â€” Honkai: Star Rail Special Episode Released
item.description: HoYoverse has released a special Interastral Peace Entertainment episode titled ‘Cipher: Getting Rich in Every Direction!’, spotlighting Cipher and the unique character ‘Phantom Thief’ Bartholos in a comedic, satirical variety-show style.
